093-180a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ s+kha la te s+kha la te ma ni te swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ khyor chu la lan gsum bzlas te/ 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma ti ba hu l+ye/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na daR+sha ne pra dz+nyA p+ta/ gam+b+hi re/ bo d+hi maN+DA nu sa ri Ni/ a bid+d+ha/ ta mon+d+ha/ ka ra bi d+ha ma ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pradz+nyA bI pe/ me d+hA pa di ni/ sarba a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ su ru su ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ me d+hA A na ya swA hA/ cho ga ni nang par zhing bzlas brjod byas na/ lobs skyen par 'gyur ro/ /sman bram hi snyim par bcug ste dud pa byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te/ zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
